Articles.Content:

Remember! No Stack Seperators!!!!!!!!!!

Please take a screenshot.

Edited October 27, 2013 by hempa2

Please read the Challenge Submission Guidelines and redo your opening post to have as much information as possible. It's not clear what is allowed/disallowed, depending on what you feel is a stack separator. Also as we can only have a limited amount of debris this challenge is almost moot.

Also as we can only have a limited amount of debris this challenge is almost moot.

you can increase the maximum amount of debris.

But . . . good question, what IS a stack separator?

you can increase the maximum amount of debris.

But . . . good question, what IS a stack separator?

The debris can be turned up to infinite.

A stack separator is a certain type of decoupler, look for the blue ones. (They do not exist radially, but Nova made a mod)

OP, please read the Challenge Rules.

The debris can be turned up to infinite.

Correct you are, my memory was faulty as I early on turned off debris alltogether but was sure I'd checked the maximum.

Did a quick search: result, perhaps draw some inspiration from that.
